title: Gold prices surge past $4,800 on jitters over Greenland dispute
full_text: Gold prices surge past $4,800 on jitters over Greenland dispute. Gold prices extended recent gains on Wednesday, surging on concerns about escalating tensions over US president Donald Trump's push to take over Greenland.. Gold prices extended recent gains on Wednesday morning, surging on concerns about escalating tensions over US president Donald Trump's push to take over Greenland.
